content: For the full-year fiscal 2022 we are increasing our revenue guidance to approximately $1.078 billion or year-over-year growth of 60%, increasing calculated billings to a range of $1.425 billion to $1.430 billion or year-over-year growth of approximately 53%, increasing our operating profit to a range of $106 million to $108 million, increasing our earnings per share to a range of $0.64 to $0.65 assuming approximately 147 million to 148 million fully diluted shares; free cash flow of $215 million, reflecting free cash flow margin of approximately 20% for the full year.
